/abilities/aqua_arrow.name: Aqua Arrow
/abilities/aqua_arrow.description: Shoots an arrow made of water at the targeted enemy

/abilities/aqua_aura.name: Aqua Aura
/abilities/aqua_aura.description: Increases water amplify and resistance for all allies

/abilities/crippling_slash.name: Crippling Slash
/abilities/crippling_slash.description: Slashes the targeted enemy and reduce their damage

/abilities/critical_aura.name: Critical Aura
/abilities/critical_aura.description: Increases critical rate for all allies

/abilities/entangle.name: Entangle
/abilities/entangle.description: Entangles the targeted enemy, dealing damage with chance to stun

/abilities/fierce_aura.name: Fierce Aura
/abilities/fierce_aura.description: Increases physical amplify and armor for all allies

/abilities/fireball.name: Fireball
/abilities/fireball.description: Casts a fireball at the targeted enemy

/abilities/firestorm.name: Firestorm
/abilities/firestorm.description: Casts a firestorm at all enemies

/abilities/flame_arrow.name: Flame Arrow
/abilities/flame_arrow.description: Shoots a flaming arrow at the targeted enemy

/abilities/flame_aura.name: Flame Aura
/abilities/flame_aura.description: Increases fire amplify and resistance for all allies

/abilities/flame_blast.name: Flame Blast
/abilities/flame_blast.description: Casts a flame blast at all enemies

/abilities/frost_surge.name: Frost Surge
/abilities/frost_surge.description: Casts frost surge at all enemies, dealing damage and reducing evasion

/abilities/ice_spear.name: Ice Spear
/abilities/ice_spear.description: Casts an ice spear at the targeted enemy, dealing damage and reducing attack speed

/abilities/insanity.name: Insanity
/abilities/insanity.description: Increases damage, attack speed, and cast speed temporarily at the cost of HP

/abilities/invincible.name: Invincible
/abilities/invincible.description: Tremendously increases armor, resistances, and tenacity temporarily

/abilities/maim.name: Maim
/abilities/maim.description: Maims the targeted enemy and causes bleeding

/abilities/mana_spring.name: Mana Spring
/abilities/mana_spring.description: Casts mana spring at all enemies, dealing damage and increasing ally MP regeneration

/abilities/natures_veil.name: Nature's Veil
/abilities/natures_veil.description: Cast's a veil over all enemies, dealing damage with a chance to blind

/abilities/penetrating_shot.name: Penetrating Shot
/abilities/penetrating_shot.description: Shoots the targeted enemy. On each successful hit, will pierce and hit the next enemy

/abilities/penetrating_strike.name: Penetrating Strike
/abilities/penetrating_strike.description: Strikes the targeted enemy. On each successful hit, will pierce and hit the next enemy.

/abilities/pestilent_shot.name: Pestilent Shot
/abilities/pestilent_shot.description: Shoots the targeted enemy, dealing damage and decreasing regeneration

/abilities/puncture.name: Puncture
/abilities/puncture.description: Punctures the targeted enemy's armor, dealing damage and temporarily reducing its armor

/abilities/quick_aid.name: Quick Aid
/abilities/quick_aid.description: Casts heal on the ally with the lowest HP percentage

/abilities/quick_shot.name: Quick Shot
/abilities/quick_shot.description: Takes a quick shot at the targeted enemy

/abilities/rain_of_arrows.name: Rain Of Arrows
/abilities/rain_of_arrows.description: Shoots a rain of arrows on all enemies

/abilities/silencing_shot.name: Silencing Shot
/abilities/silencing_shot.description: Takes a shot at the targeted enemy, temporarily silencing them

/abilities/smoke_burst.name: Smoke Burst
/abilities/smoke_burst.description: Casts a smoke burst at the targeted enemy, dealing damage and decreasing their accuracy

/abilities/speed_aura.name: Speed Aura
/abilities/speed_aura.description: Increases attack speed and cast speed for all allies

/abilities/steady_shot.name: Steady Shot
/abilities/steady_shot.description: Takes a shot at the targeted enemy with greatly enhanced accuracy

/abilities/stunning_blow.name: Stunning Blow
/abilities/stunning_blow.description: Smashes the targeted enemy and has a chance to stun

/abilities/sweep.name: Sweep
/abilities/sweep.description: Performs a sweeping attack on all enemies

/abilities/sylvan_aura.name: Sylvan Aura
/abilities/sylvan_aura.description: Increases nature amplify and resistance for all allies

/abilities/toughness.name: Toughness
/abilities/toughness.description: Greatly increases armor and resistances temporarily

/abilities/toxic_pollen.name: Toxic Pollen
/abilities/toxic_pollen.description: Casts toxic pollen at all enemies, dealing damage and decreasing armor and resistances

/abilities/water_strike.name: Water Strike
/abilities/water_strike.description: Casts a water strike at the targeted enemy
